Title.text: eInvoice and eWay Bill Generation Cockpit

ObjectStatus.icon: {= ${entryModel>DocumentStatus} === 'Success' ? 'sap-icon://sys-enter' : ${entryModel>DocumentStatus} === 'eDocument Created' ? 'sap-icon://project-definition-triangle-2' : ${entryModel>DocumentStatus} === 'E-Invoice Generated' || ${entryModel>DocumentStatus} === 'E-Way Bill Generated' ? 'sap-icon://color-fill' : ${entryModel>DocumentStatus} === 'E-Invoice Cancelled' || ${entryModel>DocumentStatus} === 'E-Way Bill Cancelled' ? 'sap-icon://cancel' : ${entryModel>DocumentStatus} === 'Cancelled' ? 'sap-icon://sys-cancel-2' : ${entryModel>DocumentStatus} === 'eDocument has errors' ? 'sap-icon://circle-task-2' : '' }
ObjectStatus.state: {= ${entryModel>DocumentStatus} === 'Success' ? 'Success' : ${entryModel>DocumentStatus} === 'eDocument Created' ? 'Warning' : ${entryModel>DocumentStatus} === 'E-Invoice Generated'|| ${entryModel>DocumentStatus} === 'E-Way Bill Generated' ? 'Success' : ${entryModel>DocumentStatus} === 'E-Invoice Cancelled'|| ${entryModel>DocumentStatus} === 'E-Way Bill Cancelled' ? 'Error': ${entryModel>DocumentStatus} === 'Cancelled' ? 'Error' : ${entryModel>DocumentStatus} === 'eDocument has errors' ? 'Error' : 'None' }
ObjectStatus.tooltip: {= ${entryModel>DocumentStatus} === 'Success' ? 'Complete' : ${entryModel>DocumentStatus} === 'eDocument Created' ? 'In Process' : ${entryModel>DocumentStatus} === 'E-Invoice Generated' ? 'E-Invoice Generated': ${entryModel>DocumentStatus} === 'E-Invoice Cancelled' ? 'E-Invoice Cancelled': ${entryModel>DocumentStatus} === 'E-Way Bill Cancelled' ? 'E-Way Bill Cancelled': ${entryModel>DocumentStatus} === 'E-Way Bill Generated' ? 'E-Way Bill Generated' : ${entryModel>DocumentStatus} === 'Cancelled' ? 'eDocument Cancelled' : ${entryModel>DocumentStatus} === 'eDocument has errors' ? 'Action Required' : '' }
